title: Credencial de conta removida
content:
Olá,

Eu tinha uma conta da universidade que era hospedada no gmail. Terminei meu curso e minha conta foi encerrada. Aí, começou a aparecer pra mim a tela de credencial. Removi minha conta antiga do Thunderbird, mas a tela de credencial continua a aparecer de forma recorrente. Já procurei por diversas configurações e não encontrei como resolver esse problema.

title: Thunderbird V115.3.3 - problems after troubleshoot mode
content:
My Thunderbird V115.3.3 locked up today and after 5 different tries, I used the safemode option. When I exited safemode, (1) my calendar is missing, (2) the hamburger menu does not work, (3) can't install any add-ons, (4) Settings does not work (but account settings does), (5) mail toolbar is missing, (6) profile manager does not work plus other things

How do I get things working again.

I need to mention I using the Portable version of TB V115.3.3.

Thanks

Craig

title: problems repeatedly to sign in with pop3.
content:
Hi, I recently switched from Pop3 to IMAP. There have been problems repeatedly to sign in with pop3.

A few days later, the problem started. Since then I have not been able to send out mails. I checked browser, Windows and Bitdefender settings. But no change. Since I can send out mails on my iphone and via my provider's vodafonemail, I would guess the problem is thunderbird. I went thru the whole recommended thunderbird prodedures but no success.

So I need your help or I will have to change my email programme.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Thanks in advance. Regards, Angela
creator: a.litzlfelder

creator: sky35508

title: Back up emails before server migration
content:
I want to use Thunderbird to back up all emails from our small business and I'm terrified of losing any. I believe the right way to go about it is to install Thunderbird, set up all email accounts as POP3 and make sure not deleted from server. But, I see that I have to set up my email before ensuring I don't delete off the server and, thus, the terror at setting up and then somehow missing the critical setting that doesn't delete off the server and pulling everything off the server into my backup.

Questions: 1) Is this the right way to back up (POP3)? 2) Is there a global default to never delete off the server? 3) For account specific, is there anything I can do to mitigate this? I'm ok doing this command-line too if there's a way to ensure the setting isn't 'missed'. 3) Is there a recommended flow for backing up email and then saving to S3 (might you consider adding this as a feature? Seems like many people would want this?)
creator: CTmoz

title: Asensin thunderbirdin uudelleen kun se vähitellen hyytyi täysin. Nyt en saa viestiluettelon sarakkeita näkyviin - otsikkopalkin klikkaus ei aiheuta mitään...

title: Thunderbird 115.7.0 (64-bit) threading bug
content: When I move an email from my Inbox to a folder, every now and again the screen refreshes and I find the emails in my Inbox are now threaded. I turn off threading by View>Sort By>Unthreaded and the view reverts to how I want it . . . until I move another message to a folder when (sometimes) the same thing happens again. Please advise, as it gets extremely annoying to have to repeatedly turn off the Threaded view.
creator: delticmann

title: Continually getting crank e-mail sent to a different email address
content:
Dear Sir/Madam: 

    I keep getting crank e-mail delivered to my account, where the addressee of these e-mails is "fredschoor@ziggo.nl", an e-mail address that means nothing to me.  How to I stop these annoying e-mail from collecting in my e-mail box?  The addresses from which these e-mails are being sent (mostly from France, ".fr") are all different, so blocking just one of the senders won't stop the rest of them. 
    Thanks in advance your your consideration of this problem.
creator: toukie

title: Thunderbird email trash
content:
Working with my ISP, I am trying to determine why my "trash" automatically empties itself despite my setting both in Thunderbird and in the settings with the ISP. I am at a total loss. When accessing the properties of the Trash folder, I have it set NOT to delete any emails in the retention section, but yet, when opening the program, without any notification or warning, many trashed emails have disappeared.

I would want to decide when mails are to be deleted. Can you provide any explanation or any advise as to avoid losing "trashed" emails. Thank you.

Ken Yeager - ken@wriede-yeager.de
creator: ken220
